Package mmj.transforms

Class ComplexRuleMap<Data>

java.lang.Object
mmj.transforms.ComplexRuleMap<Data>
Type Parameters:
Data - stored data
Direct Known Subclasses:
AssocComComplexRuleMap
public abstract class ComplexRuleMap<Data> extends Object
This class implements complex rule map. It is maps from: Statement (some operation, like (A F B), binary function), constant substitution (+ for example), closure property ( e. CC ) -> data (usually, assert or list of asserts).

TODO: improve the performance of constant substitution search

      public final <ResType> ResType visitGenStmts(ParseNode node, mmj.transforms.WorksheetInfo info, ComplexRuleMap.ComplexRuleVisitor<Data,ResType> visitor)
